name: HowManyDaysUntilPayDay
0:
”Alexa, how many days until payday”
”Alexa, tell how many days until pay day that I get paid on the 11th”
”Alexa, tell how many days until pay day that I get paid on the 26th of the month”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: how many days until payday
des:
Set the day in the month that you get paid and then simply ask Alexa to tell you how many days there are left until payday.

It is expected that you get paid between the 1st and the 28th of the month. This Skill currently doesn't support being paid on different dates each month e.g. being paid on the last working day of the month or being paid on the third Thursday of the month.

If the day that the next pay date falls on is a Saturday or Sunday then Alex will mention this when responding.

Note: Any effect public holidays may have on the day you are actually paid is not considered.
